data.text:
@MostafaToniHala Hello Mostafa&Toni,
once again, please accept our sincere apologies for the waiting.
We will verify the situation and you will be contacted by e-mail as soon as possible.
Meanwhile, if you need any further assistance, please let us know.
Thank you.

@_JuDeKiwi Hello Ju,
We have just replied to your DM.
*O A321neo Retrojet vai passar às 15h. Não percam. 😉

@LeBotNajat Hello Najat, we apologize for the delay and inform you that your situation was forwarded, as soon as it's analysis is finished you'll be contacted via e-mail.
Thank you.

@paigeandreag Hello Paige,
we will reply to your private message as soon as possible. We thank you for your understanding.

@Hygge65283194 Hello!
Our apologies for the waiting.
We have replied to your private message.
Thank you.

@_jostallard Hello Joanna,
Please let us know how may we assist you through this channel. Thank you

@Clausius Hello Clausius,
We apologize for the delay in our answer and also for the inconvenience caused by the described situation. Please let us know if you need any assistance through this channel. Thank you
@MoraisJde Poderá ligar directamente para a nossa linha Miles&GO para verificar a disponibilidade em tempo real. Obrigado
@thomas_ag Thomas, please inform us your booking reference, flight number and date so we can verify the situation.

@DiegoMedinaLpz Hola Diego,
Lamentamos el retraso en contestarle. Debido al elevado número de mensajes recibidos no ha sido posible contestar más pronto. Vamos a contestar a su mensaje privado lo antes posible. Gracias

@laviedunhomme69 Pour qu'on puisse vérifier votre question, nous vous prions de nous indiquer votre code de réservation. Par questions de sécurité, nous vous prions d'envoyer les détails par message privé. Merci  (2/2)

@laviedunhomme69 Bonsoir,
En raison d'un grand nombre de messages, le délai de réponse est actuellement long. Nous tenons à vous présenter nos excuses pour ce désagrément. (1/2)
@fellipute2408 we have replied via DM. Thank you, Fellipe 😉

data.text: @appereira Hello appereira, on your previous tweet you mentioned that you have written to us. Can you please clarify through which channel? Thank you.

@CoachingCarrots Hello Marc,
please inform us your claim file number via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@renatadoochaves Olá Renata,
respondemos através de mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@thomas_ag Hi Thomas, can you please tell us if your friend lost the passport at the airport or on the plane? Thank you
@Kushal_Narain Hi Kuskal, can you please send us the image of the error that you received? Please send us the print due DM. Thank you

@QuintanaYuri Hello Yuri,
please provide us the ticket number via private message in order to verify. Thank you.

@Kellsx90 Hello Kelly,
do you still fish to finalize the booking with the same price? Please let us know via DM. Thank you.

@Coefthi24 Pour qu'on puisse vérifier votre question, nous vous prions de nous indiquer votre code de réclamation. Par questions de sécurité, nous vous prions d'envoyer les détails par message privé. Merci  (2/2)

@Coefthi24 Bonsoir Titi,

En raison d'un grand nombre de messages, le délai de réponse est actuellement long. Nous tenons à vous présenter nos excuses pour ce désagrément. (1/2)
@investidortroll Olá, respondemos por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@Jenni_lsxo Hello Jenny,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We will answer to your private message as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding

@alvaromacarron Hello Álvaro,
in order to verify, please provide us the booking reference and the e-ticket number. For confidentiality reasons, we kindly ask you to send the details by private message. Thank you.
@MoraisJde Olá, todos os trajetos estão elegíveis para compra com milhas, contudo, irá depender da disponibilidade dos voos com milhas. Obrigado
@wagnerwltr Olá Wagner, qual o código de reserva ou número de bilhete eletrónico? Sugerimos os dados por mensagem privada por razões de confidencialidade. Obrigado.

@Jason_Torreano Hello Jason,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We will answer to your private message as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding

urls.title: TAP Products – Choose how you want to fly
urls.description: Find the right TAP product for you: find out what each product includes and also the price of booking seats or extra baggage.

data.text: From now on, and for trips starting on November 11th, our Economy fares in Europe and North Africa will be more intuitive and simpler to choose from. Discover the advantages of each one and pick which is best for you: https://t.co/lOWPYAcRyT. https://t.co/W5HtD0X5hw

data.text: A partir de agora, e para viagens a partir de 11/11, as nossas tarifas de Classe Económica na Europa e no Norte de África serão mais intuitivas e simples de escolher. Descubram as vantagens de cada uma e escolham a que melhor se adapta à vossa viagem: https://t.co/lOWPYAcRyT. https://t.co/MxY45yVyaS

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text:
@nvaanlsl Hello N,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We will answer to your private message as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding
@GloriaMGuerra Hola Gloria, cuál es el número de proceso de equipaje perdido que há abierto en el aeropuerto por favor? Le pedimos los datos vía DM. Gracias

@Thomasm52513617 Bonjour Thomas,
Nous sommes aussi disponible par ici. Pouvez-vous nous envoyer une message privé avec votre question? Merci

data.text:
@Tasha7Correia Hello Natasha,
please provide us the booking reference via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@AyAyRonnnnnn Hello A-A-Ron,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to the high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We will answer to your private message as soon as possible. (1/2)

@Aisha_Sanusi Hello Aisha,
we are still verifying the situation. We truly apologise for the time taken on this process. We will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you.
@AyAyRonnnnnn We apologize for the situation described and appreciate your comments that allow us to improve our service's quality. Please let us know if you have any other questions. Thank you (2/2)

@AdriMFontoura Olá Adriana,
estamos a verificar a sua questão pelo que retomaremos o contacto o mais breve possível. Obrigado.

@larifonte Olá Larissa,
antes de mais lamentamos a situação reportada. Solicitamos que nos indique o número de bagagem perdida através de mensagem privada para que possamos verificar. Obrigado.

@Josemdsg Hi José, we always suggest direct contact with the proper authorities to obtain more information about the entrance conditions in the countries, since they make the check of the documents. Thank you

@karlambsilva Olá Karla,
Lamentamos a demora na nossa resposta. Devido a uma grande afluência de mensagens recebidas, não nos é possível responder de forma mais célere. Responderemos à sua mensagem privada com a maior brevidade possível. Obrigada
@heliasofia Olá, qual o número da sua reclamação por favor? Sugerimos os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigado

@anapaulapreal Olá Ana, após submeter o seu pedido, este será analisado e obterá uma resposta por e-mail.
Obrigada.

@BezerraKelsei Olá Kelsei,
Por favor aceite o nosso sincero pedido de desculpas pelo transtorno causado. Agradecemos as suas considerações, trabalharemos sempre no sentido de melhorar os serviços oferecidos aos nossos passageiros.
Ao dispor para qualquer informação adicional.
Obrigada.

@ManaMonga @SetzersScience For confidential reasons, we suggest you to send this information through DM.  
Thank you. (2/2)

@imademaluco Olá Matomami, para que possamos verificar o estado da sua reclamação, por favor indique-nos o número de reclamação e endereço de e-mail associado por mensagem privada.
Obrigada.

@fellipute2408 Hello Felipe,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.

@payno1978 Hello Tim,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.

data.text:
@Kimberleyrru @Ryanair Hello Kimberley,

we're sorry however we cannot ensure a accommodation. Thank you.

@Julianavd1508 Olá Juliana,
respondemos através de mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@banzib We cannot foresee how much time it will take in order to process your complaint file, Bryan. This process might take some time. We kindly ask you to wait for our feedback, which will be made as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding.

@spreto Olá S P,
para que possamos verificar, pedimos por favor, que nos indique o número de processo e o email associado. Por razões de confidencialidade, sugerimos que nos indique os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@Bernie_Manrique Hello Bernie,
in order to verify, please provide us the process file number and the email associated. For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you.

@indaalro Hola Daniel,

ese vuelo sale del Terminal 2 😉

urls.title: Reclamação – Como podemos ajudar? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Queremos que tenha a melhor experiência TAP. Indique-nos a situação para que a possamos solucionar ou consulte o estado de uma reclamação já efetuada.

data.text:
@_MariMaia Olá, lamentamos que a experiência não tenha ido ao encontro das suas expectativas e pelo transtorno causado. Poderá apresentar as suas considerações através do link seguinte: https://t.co/lkGUopMaev
Caso possamos ajudar com qualquer outra questão adicional, estamos ao dispor.

urls.title: Portugal Air Summit – Flying for a world of opportunities!

data.text:
Preparados para o Portugal Air Summit 2022? 
De 12 a 15 de outubro, a TAP vai estar presente na maior cimeira aeronáutica da Península Ibérica. Assistam às talks dos nossos oradores e, no dia 14/10 às 13h00, vejam de perto o A321neo Retrojet.
Saibam mais: https://t.co/TUNL5lWFWu https://t.co/IOYTTJYYFd

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text:
@banzib Hello Bryan,

We understand your situation. You may fill a complaint form through the link https://t.co/3nTBK2ZDaK . After the form filled, we kindly ask you to wait for our Customer Service's feedback, in order to verify your case. Thank you.

@ocean2025 Hello ocean, we apologize for the delay on the conclusion of your refund. We assure you that your refund is being processed and will be completed as soon as possible. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

@luccas_loki Olá Luccas, de forma a verificar o estado do seu reembolso, solicitamos que nos indique o código da sua reserva ou o número do bilhete eletrónico. Por razões de segurança, pedimos que nos envie a informação por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@jm_poncelet We recommend that you do so by private message due to confidentiality reasons.
Thank you (2/2)

@jm_poncelet Hello Jean-MarcPoncelet,
Please let us know what kind of sports equipment you wish to add to your reservation, as well as the weight and dimensions and the reservation code so that we can verify this situation. (1/2)

data.text:
@Thomasm52513617 Bonjour Thomas,
Nous vous informons que vous pouvez utiliser, par exemple, les numéros de téléphone suivants:
France: (+33) 890 102 106
Portugal: (+351) 211 234 400
Si vous le souhaitez, vous pouvez également poser vos questions via Twitter.
Merci
@xequalsme Hello DJ•JD, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@lthnft lth, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@TheHaslam Hello Haslam, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@Priscil80361352 Olá Priscila, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@axelmerckx Hello Axel, we appreciate the feedback and we are glad to read that. 😊 Thank you too for contacting us. We remain available.
@lthnft Hello lth, how can we help you? For security reasons, please send us your question, via private message. Thank you.

@fabianepelucio Olá Fabiane, lamentamos imenso o atraso na resolução dos seus processos. Garantimos que estes estão a ser verificados e que será contactada, via email, o mais brevemente possível. Disponha se necessitar de ajuda adicional. Obrigado.

data.text: @tina70748559 Hello tina, in order to verify the situation, please provide us with your booking reference or the electronic ticket number. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

@Bertvdbosch We assure you nonetheless, once again, all efforts are being made so your situation is resolved as briefly as possible.
Thank you.

@Bertvdbosch Hello Bert,
we apologise for the delay on your case's conclusion. Depending on the number and on the nature of cases received, it may not be possible to reply as promptly as desired.
